title: Drawing, "Design for Embroidery of Overskirt, for Fabrique de St. Ruf", ca. 1785
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper
markings: Watermarks:  indistinct in these lines:  FIN AV AUVERGNE (?) and:  a chain suspended from a cross forming a circle in which are the letters IDI.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical rectangle.  A bunch composed of poppies and other blossoms and ears of grain is shown in the wedge.  Plants of poppies and cornflowers alternate among the hem, small plants grow in the intervals.  A row of beads and a ribbon form the hem.  Reverse:  rough sketch of the bunch of flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Embroidery of Overskirt, for Fabrique de St. Ruf", ca. 1785.
ca. 1785. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-36-20.
